title: Choose the Perfect Plan for Your Business
subtitle: Start free and upgrade as your business grows. All plans include core analytics features.
description4: For well established large scale businesses
q1: Can I change plans at any time?
a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate the charges accordingly.
q2: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
a2: Yes, all paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start your trial.
q3: What payment methods do you accept?
a3: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and support payment via K-Net for local transactions.
a4: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption for all data transmission and storage. Your credentials are never stored in plain text, and we comply with international data protection standards.
line1: Ready to transform your WooCommerce analytics?
